be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database

Class UserDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database.Database
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database.UserDatabase

  • public final class UserDatabase
extends Database
    The class is used to handle CRUD actions with the User table.
